full_threads.body:
----- REPLY ABOVE THIS LINE TO SEND A RESPONSE -----

Hi !

We got your message and have assigned it an internal Ticket Number of: 26663

Our ticket system allows us to keep track of conversations and keep you up to date on what's going on.

You can also login to your "Online Portal" with a click below to view status any time.


​We are open and monitoring tickets from 9AM-5PM Monday - Friday
​If you require urgent assistance outside of these hours, please call 1300 525 516 (option 2) to be connected to the on-call Technician.
​*Please be aware that out of hours rates will apply*


Ticket Subject: Re: Smart Reviews | July Updates

Your Message:

Hi Team,

We need a hand with some DNS updates for Simply Solar Solutions. They are:

> On 10 Jul 2024, at 3:19 pm, Shantell Grubisic wrote:
>
> Chris,
>
> That's awesome but not too sure what you need from me ?
>
> If that has anything to do with JCR feel free to email them cc either myself or Rod and I will email them for approval. =)
>
> Thanks
>
> Shantell
>
> From: Chris Paradowski
> Sent: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 3:07 PM
> To: Rodney Marsh ; Shantell Grubisic
> Subject: Smart Reviews | July Updates
>
> Hi Rod, Hi Shantell,
>
>
> We're excited to announce that we are rolling out some new updates to your Smart Reviews account. We are continually developing our platform to ensure fresh 5-star reviews have the best chance of flowing in.
>
> Here are some of our favourite new benefits:
>
>
> All review reminders are now sent via email and SMS. This means two additional SMS messages are sent to each client, keeping your request top of mind.
> All email messages will now be sent from a dedicated email address assigned to your account that uses your company domain name. This brings brand consistency and will reduce the likelihood of landing in spam folders.
> You will receive access to our platform which comes with a raft of other features such as online calendars and CRM functionality that we are offering at no extra charge for the next 6 months.
>
> Next steps - DNS updates
>
> Part of the update rollout requires some DNS updates. These updates are needed to stay ahead of the ever-tightening anti-spam measures.
>
> There are 2 ways we can do this:
>
>
> Done for you, simply send us the logins to your domain name and we will take care of everything from our end. You can securely upload your logins here: https://wolfiq.com.au/domain-name-migration/
> Do it yourself, if you prefer, we can send you the 5 domain name records that either you or your IT professional can add to your domain name.
>
> Please let me know your preference by next week.
>
> As always, if you have any questions, please let us know.
>
>
>
>
> Chris Paradowski
> Partnerships Manager
> Wolf IQ Pty Ltd
